roadmap.title: Learn Programming Languages
roadmap.description: Master essential programming languages used in software engineering.

roadmap.title: Understand Data Structures and Algorithms
roadmap.description: Gain a solid understanding of fundamental data structures and algorithms.

roadmap.title: Solve 200 LeetCode Problems
roadmap.description: Complete at least 200 problems on LeetCode to practice problem-solving skills.

roadmap.title: Achieve Top 5% Rank on Codeforces
roadmap.description: Reach a rank in the top 5% of participants on Codeforces.

roadmap.title: Complete 50 Competitive Programming Contests
roadmap.description: Participate in and complete at least 50 competitive programming contests.

roadmap.title: Contribute to Open Source Projects
roadmap.description: Get involved in and contribute to open source projects to gain real-world experience.

roadmap.title: Participate in Hackathons
roadmap.description: Take part in hackathons to enhance practical coding skills and teamwork.

roadmap.title: Build Personal Projects
roadmap.description: Develop and complete personal projects to showcase your skills and creativity.

roadmap.title: Learn System Design
roadmap.description: Understand system design principles and design scalable systems.

roadmap.title: Prepare for Technical Interviews
roadmap.description: Practice technical interview questions and mock interviews to prepare for the interview process.

roadmap.title: Apply for Internships or Entry-Level Positions
roadmap.description: Gain experience by applying for internships or entry-level software engineering positions.
